roleset.name: emit clanking noises
roleset.note: CLANK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'clank' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 43.2, Framenet entry Sound emission. (from clank.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: poor John
example.text: The chains wrapped around John clanked dully in the dark.

roleset.name: move while making clanking noises
roleset.note: CLANK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'clank' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 43.2, Framenet entry Sound emission. (from clank.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example
example.text: Marshall-1 came [*-1] clanking in like Marley's ghost dragging those chains of brigades and air wings and links with Arab despots.
example.arg: like Marley's ghost dragging those chains of brigades and air wings and links with Arab despots
